name: Virtual Race Car Engineer 2020
description: Intermediate level setup tuning - VRCE fine tunes your baseline setup to get the most out of the car… fast! Now with even more options and advice.

name: Final Fantasy IV: Unprecedented Crisis
description:
This is a complete hack of Final Fantasy 4 (2 US) for SNES which shows off many of the features of the hacking utility, FF4kster. There are a few assembly hacks which cannot be achieved within the editor alone, but they are few in number and mostly for cosmetic purposes.

It may seem at first that the changes are limited to gameplay and the plot is unchanged, but don’t worry, there is a point in the plot after which it branches from the original and begins an entirely new chain of events.

name: Quake: January Jump Jam 2
description:
January Jump Jam 2 is a map jam-pack made of 15 acrobatic maps, built with the base-themed Alkaline mod kit (included in the download) which adds a "jump boots" powerup for mid-air jumps.

Some of the maps are quite difficult. Expect floating platforms, bottomless pits, and void maps.

Includes start map, built-in difficulty select, custom soundtrack, and map source.

name: Draw a Stickman: Epic & Epic 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Good puzzle: Music
description: This puzzle type puzzle game. In the game, you need to collect a full-fledged image from small pieces that are randomly scattered across the screen. The images contain a variety of images with a musical direction

name: The Dark Stares Back
description: The Dark Stares Back is an Indie horror strategy game where you must carefully plan your movement in a house with no power or escape against multiple home invaders with no purpose but to hunt you. Each of them behaves in their own unique way, from being in the room you were in last, to waiting for you to open doors to ambush you, and more. You must learn from your experience to evade them long enough to survive until 7 AM to win. It's all about learning, strategy, and execution.

name: Batman: The Dark Knight
description:
This hack changes the elements of the original Batman - The Video Game and assembles it to the style of the film: The Dark Knight of Christopher Nolan, the changes are the following:

New scenarios.
New color palette on the backgrounds.
New color palette for Batman. (Credits to the creator of this patch)
Portraits of Joker (Jack Nicholson) and Vicki Vale (Kim Basinger) are changed for Joker (Heath Ledger) and Harvey Dent (Aaron Eckhart)
Difficulty toned down.

name: Commandos 2 & Praetorians HD Remaster Doube Pack
description: Relive two masterpieces, originally developed by the legendary Pyro Studios, that defined the real-time tactics genre like nothing before, re-imagined in full HD and bundled together for the first time ever! In Commandos 2 – HD Remaster, take control of an elite group of commandos, venture deep into enemy territory and utilize their combined expertise to complete a series of notoriously demanding missions set in World War II. Prepare to face overwhelming odds as you operate covertly to turn the tide of war.

name: Your Sister's Drown'd, Laertes
description:
Your Sister's Drown'd, Laertes is a feverdream for at least four people. one of you will play ophelia, while the others decide who ophelia was and what she meant to them.

in some ways, it is a game about grief.

in another way, it is an examination of the manic pixie dream girl, and how there is a real person behind that title.

it is heavily inspired by hamlet act v, scene i, in which hamlet and laertes leap into the open grave of ophelia to fight over who loved her more.

name: Aerocraft
description: Free flight in an infinite space

name: Corpse Reviver
description: CORPSE REVIVER is a fast-paced vertical scrolling shoot-em-up where you play as a skull in a world made of trash and shoot things.

name: Orders of Magnitude
description: Have you ever wondered what the whole Universe looks like? With the myriad Galaxies, each containing billions of Stars, including our Solar System? Have you seen a Human Brain and its Neurons? DNA? What about the Electrons surrounding the tiny Atomic Nucleus? And what lies at even smaller scales?

name: Butter Royale
description: Have the food fight of your life in the #1 battle royale game on Arcade! Play solo or in squads against 31 others in fast-paced 5 minute food fights. Fire sauce-shooting, bread-blasting tools and knock out your opponents with food! Use Power-Ups to heal your squad or trap your opponents in a flood of thick, delicious milkshake!

name: Dragon and Weed: Origins OB - Dual Edges
description: In 2053, war is big money. When biotech searchers are abducted, two skilled mercenaries have to extract them. To accomplish their mission, they’ll have to face the n°1 private army. Dive into this world without mercy for a thrilling action story.

name: Retro Tanks
description: Retro Tanks is an intense, fast-paced tank shooter game. It is fun, easy to learn and addicting. Play alone, together with friends or against your friends and show your navigation and reaction skills in 6 different game modes and countless pixelized levels.

name: Labyrinth
description: Explore a castle high in the sky. Open new paths, grow stronger and find crystals. Can you make it to the end?

name: Mid or Feed
description: Simulator of life of cyberathlete, going to his main goal - win on TI. Along the way, you will have to face a lot of challenges for the sake of victory, becoming not only a star of eSports, but also an integral part of the most brutal gaming community.

name: Chinese Brush Simulator
description: A simulator for showing the way of writing and drawing in ancient China.

name: Drying Paint Simulator VR
description: After a long and cold journey, "the artist" has finally arrived at his deserted cabin in the woods. The perfect peaceful place to create his final masterpiece. The artist's Magmum Opis. Drying Paint Simulator VR is the narrated exhilarating story of an artist (you) creating their last painting. A masterpiece.

name: The Unseen Fears: Ominous Talent - Collector's Edition
description: The search for a missing art critic uncovers an otherworldly web of lies!

name: The Twins
description: The Twins can be classified as a psychological and atmospheric horror game. However... This isn't a game... Remember all of the urban legends from your childhood? Imagine if it was all real, but we just weren't performing the right rituals to summon these beings from another realm... Well, now you can...

name: Run Dude
description: Hardcore, bloody platformer with a simple dude.

name: Your Quest 2
description: Gather resources. Build a village and protect your people. Give them jobs to become self sufficient, and arm them to survive the attacks of hungry predators. Explore what lurks beneath the surface, and hope you have prepared well enough to survive it. This is your quest.

name: Path of Redemption
description:
“Path of Redemption” is a dark fantasy role play game, a tribute to the great titles like Dark Souls series, Sekiro, Onimusya. 
You need to fight your own way to survive the deadly enviroments. 
The using of counter attack system is very important to conquer the strong enemies. 
If you are a fan to this type of game, please give a try!

name: Fallen Hearts
description:
This is a multiplayer RTS/RPG game from the first person in a fictional medieval world. Take control of one of the castles and become the sole king of all lands 
 
You, as a true king, only give orders, in this game you do not need to take special care of micromanagement, but the key decisions in the economy and war depend only on you. You can personally explore the world in search of artifacts that will help you defeat your enemies or go into battle with your army.

name: Jinmakyou Kyousei-tan
description: A 3D action adventure that cooperates with monster girls to capture dungeons.

name: BallsBlasterVR
description: Try your shooting skills in arcade mode. Destroy the balls by creating combinations. Get the best score !!

name: The Dreams of Candlelight
description: This is a suspense plot decryption game during the Republic of China, telling the protagonist in order to find the mysterious past that happened sixteen years ago...

name: Ghost in the Barn House
description: Ghost In The Barn House is a 2D Survival Horror game based on the story of an old Haunted barn which was built in the 1800s in Texas.

name: Lumin's Path
description: Lumin's Path is an atmospheric 3D platformer using light and darkness to impact the world in mysterious ways.

name: 4x4 Off-Road Challenge
description: Petrol heads and off-road driving enthusiasts get to experience off-road simulation with the 20 best 4x4 off-road vehicles ever developed in various terrains. It's not just about power and speed. You have to master balancing, control and maneuvering for you to succeed and finish the 4x4 off-road challenge.

name: AshenForest
description: AshenForest is a roguelite action RPG focused on boss-rush. To purify the ashen forest that is causing the plague, you must fight against all the monsters lurking in the forest.

name: Praetorians HD Remaster
description: Relive the celebrated real-time strategy classic Praetorians, re-imagined in high definition. Praetorians is set amidst the political machinations of an emerging Roman Empire.

name: Commandos 2: HD Remaster
description: Relive the real-time tactics masterpiece that defined the genre like no other: Commandos 2 - HD Remaster is a true homage to one of gaming’s most celebrated masterpieces.

name: Flatspace
description: Flatspace is a top-down space trading game with the emphasis on freedom and exploration. You become captain of a spaceship in a living simulation of a distant galaxy. As a space pilot, you decide how to earn a living; command your crew, buy new and better ships and equipment, and explore.

name: Maimai DX Plus
description:
An updated version of maimai DX.

General Information / Changes
"Partner" and "Stamp Card" feature added.
- When you first play でらっくす PLUS, you choose one of six stamp cards, featuring the cast of FiNALE; it cannot be changed until it's filled with ten stamps.
- For each day maimai is played, one stamp is awarded, regardless of the amount of credits entered.
- When a card is filled with ten stamps, the corresponding partner can be obtained.
- A partner can be chosen at the collection settings screen or on maimaiDX-NET, like other types of collections.
- The chosen partner replaces Delu-kuma (でらっくま) on the result screen.
- Some system voices also give partners unique voice.

name: Star Shoot VS
description: Star Shoot VS is a casual online shooting game.

name: Trailmakers: Skin Pack
description: Make your creations look amazing with cool skins

name: Trailmakers Hat Pack
description:
Have you ever thought to yourself: “This awesome Viking ship that I just built in Trailmakers is missing something… like a Viking?” If so, you're in luck! With the Hat Pack, YOU can be that Viking.

The Hat Pack contains 13 pieces of headwear for the characters in Trailmakers. If you purchase this pack, you will have all headwear options available in the game.

name: Bunker of Barzai
description: Medium-sized metal/runic dungeon; uses a few custom textures.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Winter Solstice
description: A romhack for Zelda II.

name: SpeedRunners: FortKnight's Fast Faction
description: Adds 5 new runners to the character select: FortKnight, ManekiNeko, SherlockBones, Veloci-t-rex and Flamenco!

name: SpeedRunners: Mr. Quick's Speedy Bunch
description: Adds 5 new runners to the character select: Mr. Quick, Dr. Smart, JailBird, Luc j'adore and Excel!

name: SpeedRunners: Salem's Sprint Squad
description: Adds 5 new runners to the character select: Salem, SkullDuggery, Beachbod SpeedRunner, Summertime Cosmo and Burger!

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Touhou Project Arrangements Pack 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Touch the Color
description:
Take your reflexes and aim to the next level with Touch the Color, the arcade-style reaction and accuracy game that’s easy to pick up but hard to put down.

In Touch the Color, you’re given a matrix of colors but only one is your target. All you need to do is click on the correct color as fast as possible to ramp up your score. If its simplicity is reminding you of time-waster games, think again. Touch the Color is an arcade reaction time game that’ll work your mouse aim and take it to new heights. The faster and more accurately you click, the sharper your brain and skills become.

name: SpeedRunners: Civil Dispute! Character Pack
description: Play as Showtime, Cannon Fyodor, Diamond Diva or Dashwell with this new character pack for SpeedRunners! Each character comes in four colours and with unique animations. These are purely cosmetic additions and do not affect gameplay.

name: Villain Project
description: Each image is like a chapter of a book. To understand the whole story, complete all levels and check Leopold and his adventure, his practice session, and his final test.

name: Dying Light: Shu Warrior Bundle
description: The bundle includes a new outfit which reduces the chance of being grabbed by a zombie, a new buggy paint job, and three new weapons (a crossbow, a sword, and a polearm).

name: Fire Emblem: The Four Kings
description: The story centers on three brothers: Walter, Lionel, and Terril. They are the royals of the country of Askia in the land of Ibril. Terril is the current king, and he sends his brothers out on a diplomatic meeting with the king of the western nation of Behanzin. But the brothers constantly argue, and when things get rough, their relationship becomes strained even further…

name: Volley & Tennis Bundle Blast
description: Smash that ball and have a real blast enjoying the best sports!

name: Sunburnt
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Dark Witch Renovation: Day Stage
description: You can play the Day stage. It is a very difficult stage, so it is recommended to play after all stages have been completed.

name: Fire Pro Wrestling World: Yoshihiro Takayama Charity DLC Part 2
description: Add rings, logos and T-shirts representing legendary Japanese pro-wrestler and MMA combatant Yoshihiro Takayama with this Edit Part DLC.

name: Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020: Arcade Edition
description: In this arcade companion game to Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020 and the second arcade installment of the Mario & Sonic series. As with the Nintendo Switch version, the game takes place in Tokyo, Japan, home of the 2020 Summer Olympics, and features events from both 2020, as well as 2D Events from the 1964 Summer Olympics, which were also held in Tokyo.

name: Wacca S
description: The first major update to the arcade rhythm game Wacca, which added BPM notation, synchronising the start time of music during multiplayer play, and new game modes.

name: OmoTomO
description: This game not only provides a relaxing experience with a zen garden environment, but also challenges players with a variety of puzzles, whilst experiencing the growth of the OmoTomO creature. OmoTomO is suited for new and experienced puzzle players, with its steadily rising difficulty. Sit down, take a deep breath, and give yourself a relaxing while with Omotomo!

name: Pinball Breaker VI
description: Pinball Breaker VI is a brick breaking game which combines the game mechanics of a traditional brick breaker game and a flipper game. Play through 15 exciting levels as you aim for a high score.

name: Dual Brain Vol.2: Reflex
description: Solve the problem within the time limit and aim for a high score. The high score in the game is registered in the online ranking. Compete for scores with players around the world.

name: Jewel Wars
description: The year is 2039... All money is now collected and managed through an online network known as Gold Asset. This includes money generated through illegal and exploitative avenues. And so a plan was concocted to return that money to the world... Jewel Rush is a fighting action game that can be played by up to 4 players. The rules are simple, so anyone can play casually, or more seriously. Collect the Jewels, which are pieces of financial data, and cash them in! The aim of the game is to collect more money than anyone else. In Free Battle mode, you can with up to 4 players. Perfect for whether you want to gather friends, or play others all over the world online. Battle your friends and family in this action packed heist! In the single-player Story Mode, play through each stage and watch the adventures of our four intriguing heroes unfold! Yuichi Endo, descendant of Heikichi Endo, the fiend with twenty faces. Frederica Mina Lupin, descendant of the phantom thief, Arsene Lupin. Kichijiro Nezu, descendant of the chivalrous thief, Jirokichi "Nezumi Kozo". Shieru Ishikawa, descendant of the legendary thief, Goemon Ishikawa. There are two difficulties to choose from, so even beginners to action games will be able to pick it up straight away!

name: Overcooked! 2: Spring Festival
description:
Celebrate the Year of the Rat with this free seasonal update!

– Cook two delicious seasonal recipes – bubbling hot pots and fresh fruit platters
– Five new beautifully themed Lunar New Year kitchens
– Two new chefs added to the roster – rat chef and turtle chef

name: Just Glide
description: Remember the good ol'days of throwing your own paper plane into the air? Just Glide is just about that. Sit down, relax and enjoy your paper plane's flight. In Just Glide you control a small, brave paper airplane, making its way forward. Fly through air hoops, avoid incoming projectiles, push through rainy clouds and pierce through obstacles. The further you make it, the more challenging it gets!

name: MicroHorrorArcade Trilogy I - Andy's Story
description: An anthology about a guy named Andy who finds himself in some interesting situations.

name: Pleroma
description: In Pleroma, you will take on the role of Diane Kestler, a youthful individual who has recently moved to a new part of town and is starting a new job at a niche art gallery / studio collective / research library which is (you guessed it!) hiding a rather surprising and unusual secret.

name: Remnants
description: Remnants is a top-down exploration game about descending underground into a mysterious abandoned facility.

name: QT
description: QT is a 3 part game about hanging out in cute places and finding your favorite friends.

name: Magnificent 5
description: 100 players across a massive battlefield. 5 Players per Team. 20 total teams. Explore, Collect, Take Aim and Pull the Trigger. Meet the new Battle Royale, WILD WEST Style!

name: Classic Card Game Pinochle
description: What could be more enjoyable than this classic trick-and-meld card game? Pinochles' phases will have you captivated for hours.

name: Classic Card Game Euchre
description: Try your hand at this old-time favorite card game. Trick-taking makes for an action-packed round of cards. Go for the perfect loner hand for spades trump.

name: Classic Card Game Canasta
description: As a card game in the rummy family, Canasta stands out as a true classic. The tactics and strategy required make this game one of challenging fun.

name: Classic Card Game Old Maid
description: The perfect kid-friendly game for the whole family! Play the classic card game Old Maid on your computer. Who will be left with the odd Queen to become the Old Maid?

name: IMM Defense 2
description: This is a very beautiful two-way fluorescent tower defense game.

name: Pyramid Defense
description: Grave robberies' army are coming. Pyramid Defense is a 3D tower defense game. Grave robberies' army will rush to the pyramid from all directions to seize the Pharaoh's coffin. You will play the guard of the pyramid, sniping at the bandits with various weapons.

name: Arcade Archives: XX Mission
description: XX Mission is a shooting game released by UPL in 1986. While switching between air and ground attacks, take out the approaching large and small craft and large fleets. Powering up allows you to use different powerful air attacks and wider ranged ground attacks depending on the ship's form.

name: Sky Pirates of Actorius
description: Infiltrate a pirate airship and foil the captain’s plans! Can you survive the greedy crew and ruthless officers and disrupt their schemes in time?

name: K-Point Ski Jumping
description: K-Point Ski jumping is as the title says, 2D Ski jumping game. 34 Real Life based hills Career mode Physics based Mouse controls Online Hill...

name: Dungeon Origins
description: Betrayed by the kingdom, the hero seeks his revenge as a new dungeon master! Build and manage your dungeon, raid villages, unlock new evolutions, grow an army of powerful monsters and then fulfill your revenge against the kingdom!

name: Olaguna Chronicles
description: In Olaguna Chronicles Every character in the game will have a profile, and some will change their lives because of the decisions you make! Their records will be different! Maybe it's a friend, maybe it's an enemy...

name: Emily Archer and the Curse of Tutankhamun
description: Lady Archer is invited to Egypt to see the priceless treasure of King Tutankhamun by her friend Lord Carnarvon. She arrives to find her dear friend murdered and the mask of Tutankhamun stolen. Collect evidence to solve the murder in this hidden object game!

name: Rover Mechanic Simulator
description: As an Engineer - crew member of one of the first Mars colonies - you are responsible for repairing and maintaining Mars Rovers. In this advanced simulator you will learn the internal details of various Mars Rovers and their components.

name: The Ghost Tower
description: The Ghost Tower is a futuristic dungeon crawler with survival horror elements where you fight your way to the top floor of a mysterious tower while piloting your own Robotic Combat Suit.

name: TaniNani
description: Explore a unique puzzle experience in your own pace. TaniNani is a puzzle game where you move parts of the level around to help the characters find the crystal and each other.

name: Time Fragments: 24h in Capua
description: Time Fragments: 24h in Capua is an adventure RPG game set in 73 BC during the famous slave rebellion in Capua lead by the infamous Thracian soldier Spartacus. You have 24h to find your missing friends.

name: Medarots S: Unlimited Nova
description: Sin descripción

name: Dezatopia
description: A horizontal shooter in which the player controls a four-way shooting ship in a world dynamically changing its difficulty to match the player's skill level.

name: Void Terrarium
description:
"Even in the darkest times, hope is homegrown. Void Terrarium chronicles the story of a robot and a young girl in a world devastated by enigmatic events. Explore hauntingly beautiful ruins in search of food and supplies, outfit and maintain the "terrarium" in which you live, and do whatever it takes to protect and nurture the last surviving human in this care simulator-meets-roguelike title."

void tRrLM(); //Void Terrarium is a roguelike RPG set in a ruined world contaminated by fungi, starring the last human girl Toriko and a helper robot. Since Toriko is unable to survive in the polluted world, the player takes on the role of the helper robot, who must replenish the environment of the “Terrarium” where she spends each day.

name: Rugby 20
description: Rugby 20 gives you the complete rugby experience! With overhauled tactics management, optimised graphics and more realistic player behaviour, the game is a true reflection of modern rugby.

name: Kingdom Hearts III: Re Mind
description:
Kingdom Hearts III Re Mind is a DLC expansion of Kingdom Hearts III. It was released on PlayStation 4 on January 23, 2020, and was released for Xbox One on February 25, 2020.

There are two versions of the DLC available for purchase; a standard edition costing $29.99, and a second edition including a recording of the Kingdom Hearts Orchestra -World of Tres- Osaka performance, costing $39.99. Additionally, a free patch became available shortly before the DLC's release, which grants players the ability to unlock Oathkeeper and Oblivion Keyblades free of charge.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Sega Ages Fantasy Zone
description:
The Fantasy Zone is a solar system consisting of eight brightly colored, fantastic planets. The evil Menons are trying to take over all of the planets in the Fantasy Zone by using misappropriated foreign currency to build their forces. It is the player's job to recover all of the coins and save the solar system!.

This version is for Nintendo Switch.

name: Deadsiege
description: Enter the apocalyptic fantasy world filled with monsters and demons, become the only warrior experiences intense combats and slay thousands of enemies in an epic action RPG.

name: Without A Roof (W.A.R.)
description: Hunt, or be hunted - W.A.R. is a game of dark humor and mischievous choices... Blood-lust is rampant and thriving. Discover ways to deceive other players or aid them along their way. Bounty hunters are everywhere, murder is punishable, and suicide is encouraged. How will you survive Without A Roof?

name: The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners
description: Saints & Sinners is a game unlike any other in The Walking Dead universe. Every challenge you face and decision you make is driven by YOU. Fight the undead, scavenge through the flooded ruins of New Orleans, and face gut-wrenching choices for you and the other survivors. Live The Walking Dead.

name: Tetris
description: Welcome to Tetris, the official mobile app for the world’s favorite puzzle game. Battle to be the last one standing in 100-player Tetris Royale mode, play a quick round to beat your own score, or play infinite rounds to master your skills in the Tetris Single Player modes. Tetris forever!

name: Nymble
description: Join Jack as he climbs the never-ending beanstalk in this cute turn-based puzzle platformer adventure. Explore 5 exciting worlds and 100 levels, encountering a vibrant cast of enemies each with their own unique abilities along the way.

name: Neko Yume
description: Neko Yume is an ambient exploration game heavily inspired by games like LSD Dream Emulator and Yume Nikki. Explore a cat-filled dream with a day/night cycle and dozens of randomized events. Even if you have explored an area once, there is no guarantee that it will be the same upon your return.

name: X-Plane 11: FunnerFlight PHNL - Honolulu International Airport + Pearl Harbor
description: Honolulu International Airport is one of the world's largest, busiest and most beautiful airports, now in X-Plane 11!

name: Strike! Ten Pin Bowling
description: A full classic 10 Pin Bowling for 1-4 players.

name: My Diggy Dog 2
description: The gameplay combines the genres of digger and platformer. During their adventures the player will explore dungeons full of challenging puzzles and find a variety of equipment, countless artifacts, and a large space for new discoveries. Features: -Journey to various locations -A large map to explore in any direction -Hidden collectible artifacts -Large dungeons full of traps and puzzles -Unique digging mechanics -Exciting bonus levels -A dynamic upgrade system -A touching story full of twists -Stunning graphics…

name: Beamdog Ultimate Collector's Pack
description:
Contains:

- The Enhanced Editions of Baldur's Gate, Baldur's Gate: Siege of Dragonspear, Baldur's Gate 2, Planescape: Torment, Icewind Dale and Neverwinter Nights.
- Engraved metal dice set and Beholder dice bowl
- Morte squishy
- Parchment style map of All Worlds
- Faux leather journal
- Set of two pins
- Four Lithograph prints

name: Isoland 3: Dust of the Universe
description: A sequel to the Isoland series, where you continue your journey to explore the story of the universe on this island.

name: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds: Season 6
description: Season 6 is upon us and it brings with it a brand new island to the Battlegrounds. Karakin has risen like its namesake from the sea to bring intense action and quick gameplay to PUBG. New dangers, new weapons and a whole new island also awaits!

name: Raver Champions
description: Raver Champions is a couch multiplayer game (local and online), the main objective is to score a goal before your opponent. To accomplish this you can push the ball with your own body, or you can shoot it with your gun! However your bullets are limited, so be careful with them.

name: Game of Puzzles: Space
description: Game of Puzzles: Space - is a simple puzzle on a space theme.

name: Funny AntiVirus TD
description: Funny AntiVirus TD is a Tower Defence Game with 10 kinds of Tower and over 50 kinds of Virus ,you need make a plan of build Tower and pass every level

name: Ghone is gone
description: Under guard 24/7 by his enemies, ex-Nisson Motors CEO Loscar Gon tries to escape a country, using various tools. Once a titan of the car industry and a CEO of the cartel of Ruso, Nisson, and Bishibishi corporations Loscar Gon is under a country’s heavy 24/7 monitoring.

name: Inglorious Pirate
description: Inglorious pirate is a 2D platformer with side-view shooter elements. The player will play the role of an old pirate, from whom a treasure treasure was stolen.

name: Zooma
description: Immerse in the universe of a magic mind-teaser in VR. Do you have what it takes to make your way through all the riddles and save the world in time? Check out what happens if you mix shooting, puzzles and classic match-three in virtual reality.

name: Herbalist Simulator
description: Become a herbalist in a small village. Treat various diseases using natural methods. Prepare healing mixtures. Travel to search for better ingredients. Do not wait.

name: You are Pig Sitter
description: You need to plow the soil and grow up crops with poor land for live. make machine with doctor and use it ! you can make more efficient way to harvest! and one day make automatic everything!

name: Look Inside
description: Look Inside is a 2.5D narrative game based on the palpable interactions that the player makes in a book summarizing in images and texts the life of a French family at different times and periods of their members' lives.

name: Alien Shooter 2: The Legend
description: Meet the completely reworked legendary game loved by millions of players worldwide! Alien Shooter 2 - the Legend is an ambitious follow-up to the famous Alien Shooter series.

name: Formula Car Racing Simulator
description: Go bumper to bumper with intelligent rivals racers in Formula car racing simulator.

name: Water Park: Fun Water Slides
description: Do you like active rest and adrenalin? Do you like roller-coasters and other extreme races? Then let's go to the water park together with Hippo! Funny kids games, waterslides, jumps into water and other unbelievable attractions are waiting for us! It is time to jump into swimming pool, swim and have fun! Call friends to try new crazy races on water slides. Water park simulator is created for all the family, these are the best kids games!

name: MP1: Tropical Trouble
description: Sin descripción

name: Memoria: Stories of La Garma
description: 16,500 years ago, a group of humans came back to their shelter in Spain after hunting. The entrance had collapsed, leaving everything trapped inside. Narrated by Geraldine Chaplin, this VR experience invites you to explore the memories of the cave, untouched and preserved for thousands of years.

name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 R
description: Upgraded version of Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6

name: Luigi Run
description:
Run as long as you can!

Avoid obstacles and crush enemies! Collect bouncing mushrooms to get bigger, collect the mushroom again and become a GIANT!

In the giant form, nothing can resist you.

Take to the sky with your Happy Flying Cloud.

name: Dreamdisc
description:
Dream emulator based on 5 of my dreams.

5-in-one Dream Collection, transposed into readable disc format.
Dreams dreamt by Adam Pype with sounds by Viktor Kraus.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - VFR Real Scenery NexGen 3D - Vol. 4: Scotland
description: Just Flight's NexGen 3D series of UK photographic scenery combines high resolution photographic textures with accurately placed autogen objects and additional custom scenery objects to give a true '3D' feel to your VFR flights.

name: Caveman Chuck: Prehistoric Adventure
description: Caveman Chuck: Prehistoric Adventure is a classic 2D platformer where you fight with dinosaurs in stone age. You're taken back all the way to the Stone Age where you play the role of a crude caveman named Chuck.

name: Frostpunk: The Last Autumn
description: Learn about the tragic turn of events that lead to the grim world of Frostpunk in the prequel expansion, The Last Autumn. Vastly expanding upon the Frostpunk universe by introducing a brand new scenario, the expansion content also introduces game-changing new mechanics, unique architecture, and broadens the game's deep lore and narrative.

name: Hearthstone: Descent of Dragons - Galakrond's Awakening
description:
Galakrond’s Awakening is the final solo adventure in the Year of the Dragon and will conclude the saga that began with The Dalaran Heist. When we last left our heroes and villains, the Tombs of Terror had been unsealed, spreading plagues across the sands of Uldum. The League of Explorers defeated the Plague Lords, but Arch-Villain Rafaam escaped with the Plague of Undeath. We now know why: to resurrect Galakrond, the progenitor of all dragons!

Will E.V.I.L. prevail and prove that Rafaam is truly the evilest of all villains? Will the Explorers defeat Rafaam and save the world? In this adventure, you have the power to choose. Galakrond’s Awakening is two stories in one, giving players the ability to play through both versions of the story and experience two completely different endings. Unlike The Dalaran Heist and Tombs of Terror, Galakrond’s Awakening returns to the classic linear adventure format, allowing you to progress through the story by completing individual boss encounters in order.

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Myths of Ancient Greece
description: Myths of Greece in 500 high quality images.

name: Touch
description: Kyou and Anna have a lovely relationship in high school. One night, while Anna's parents are away, the two of them go to her home. After sleeping together, Kyou has a nightmare in which Anna is dead.

name: Bingo Hall
description: Bingo Hall is a very fun and simple game to play with almost any number of people. It handles all the management of a bingo game with manual controls or an automated experience with announcer.

name: Shenmue III: Battle Rally
description:
A battle race set in Bailu is about to begin!
The participants in this race are...
The hero of the story, facing off against destiny, Ryo Hazuki
The elusive, treasure-seeking Wuying Ren
and, making her first appearance in this game, Ryo's sparring partner, Wei Zhen.

name: The Sims 4: Tiny Living Stuff
description: Think big, build small with The Sims 4: Tiny Living Stuff. Create the tiny, comfy home of your Sims' dreams using space-saving furniture and a new residential lot type for small builds. Cosy up by dressing your Sims in stylish attire and oversized cashmere sweaters.

name: Pick, shoot, repeat!
description: Gun-building with 35 upgrades. Easy to control, but hard to master. Endless combinations! How long can you survive?

name: The Tawashi
description: It's a vertical scrolling shooting game (Vertical Shmup) with a slightly nostalgic atmosphere! Avoid and shoot and avoid and shoot and avoid!

name: Lu Dajishen II
description: Lu dajishen II is a traditional RPG role-playing game. Its main playing method is to complete the plot task, fight against monsters and upgrade, and collect fashion / equipment. Here you will play the role of a passer-by coming to the miracle land, which is a world respected by the strong. Try to survive!

name: Operation Deep Magic: Cryptanalysis
description: Reconnaissance operatives infiltrated a corporate building and extracted electronics and files encrypted with 56-bit DES. Items were handed over to you, the cryptanalyst. Your mission is to decrypt the files.

name: Spooky Spins: Remastered - Steam Edition
description: Spooky Spins Remastered is a 5 reel, 25 payline slot machine (pokie) with a Spooky theme.

name: Model Kit Simulator VR
description:
Model Kit Simulator VR is a casual simulation where players can assemble and paint simple model kits in VR: 
 
- Great for people looking for leisure VR experience 
- Easy to get into; great for showing off VR to your friends 
- Has multiple model kits to choose from

name: The Lost Brewery
description:
You will be called upon to help the Gnome Miners carve out their tunnels, fight against the Gremlin Pests who insidiously sabotage the Gnomes' sophisticated machinery, stave off death in clashes with your rival, resolve the in-house problems of an enchanting Elven innkeeper, find your way out of a web of intrigue woven by crafty sorcerers and succubi, and much, much more.
Atmospheric graphics, old school combat, elaborate dialogue, and nuanced characters will ensure your full immersion in this truly unforgettable, fantastic adventure.

name: Immanence
description:
Immanence is a psychological thriller, the spiritual successor to the one of the previous games by Cat In A Jar Games called Nyctophilia. This is an author's project, developed by one person. 
 
The game keeps the main features of the original, such as atmosphere, visual style and approach to the soundtrack, while raising the bar for quality. More attention is paid to the gameplay and variety of situations. 
 
Immanence is a small free adventure, full walkthrough takes approximately 1-2 hours.

name: Night of The Living Dead VR
description: NOTD VR is an exploratory experience that captures the original spirit of the film in black and white, immersing users in a 3D recreation of the film’s farmhouse set. Exclusive interviews with film experts and original cast and crew enrich the experience with insights into the horror classic.

name: Caveman the Game
description: Even in Prehistoric times love existed. Play as the Caveman and help him rescue the love of his life who has been taken by a gang of rebel cavemen. Lead the Caveman through 20 levels of jumping over tarpits, climbing vines and fighting dinosaurs to free his love from the clutches of the rebel caveman gang!

name: Beyond Enemy Lines 2 Online
description: Beyond Enemy Lines 2 Online is a free-to-play military first-person-shooter focused around tactical gameplay and weapon modifications. Players can quickly modifiy their weapons on the fly and master their skill in a wide range of game maps, modes and weapons on Dedicatded Servers. Entirely for free!

name: Kika & Daigo: A Curious Tale
description: Kika & Daigo: A Curious Tale is a local splitscreen co-op game where you go on an adventure to find your lost grandpa. Use your unique abilities to work together to solve the mystery of grandpa's disappearance. Can you find back grandpa?

name: Ether Loop
description: Ether Loop is a hardcore fast-paced bullet hell with roguelike elements. Descend the unforgiving depths of a mysterious world, encounter challenges, discover dynamic environments and fight ruthless creatures while unveiling the secrets of Ether Loop.

name: Battle Bruise 2
description: Back again, not messy, but MESS ITSELF!

name: Global Fortune
description: Global Fortune is a business management game on a global scale. Build and manage a global supply chain, take advantage of regional specialties in production, and ship your products around the world to maximize your profits as prices fluctuate naturally. How large can your corporate empire be?

name: Swordbreaker: Back to the Castle
description: Action adventure in a medieval fantasy universe of the Swordbreaker, where you can learn how to break swords and learn about the adventures of the mighty Swordbreaker before his coming to the mysterious castle.

name: Drawkanoid
description:
Smash things at hyperspeed in Drawkanoid, a re-imagining of the classic brick-breaking genre. Draw your paddle to bounce blindly fast balls exactly where you want them. There's bullet time to help you out, but the game gets faster as you get better. Upgrade your ship and deploy powerups strategically to help you survive and score huge combos in the blink of an eye. 
 
Last brick syndrome is dead!

name: Galactea
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Smash Bros. CMC+
description: CMC+ (stands for Character Making Community) is the biggest official modpack to date, including many, many character and stage mods both released here and exclusive to the modpack itself, as well as a myriad of perks and features that the other builds currently doesn't allow for (an all new Assist system, the ability to assign stages to characters for them to appear in in Classic Mode, alongside many more!).

name: Rachel and Ariane
description:
It is Halloween and Rachel is going to a costume party a local college bar is having across the street from her off-campus condo.

She wears a sexy costume she knows at the very least would turn a few eyes her way. Hopefully, she can win the contest too.

Things don’t quite go as planned, however, as her costume turns out not to be so unique.

In anticipation of Something’s In The Air Redux coming in April, the separate purchase of the older Something’s In The Air and Rachel Meets Ariane has been discontinued. Rachel Meets Ariane will be included as a bonus in the Somethings In The Air Redux game.

name: Witch Rush
description: Rush through an enchanted forest as a cute little pixel witch while enemies try to stop you and darkness tries to catch you in this free-to-play endless runner! Hop over the enemies and collect power-ups to earn more points! Enjoy the music and just rush through!

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Keeper of Mine
description: Keeper of Mine is based off of the novel and promotional webtoon, I'll Protect the Second Male Lead's Love! During the events of the book, you control and play as Leah Stephilia De Lenokyn as she navigates the world of 'From Hostage to Empress', a novel read shortly before her transmigration. Eager to save the tragic fate of the second male lead, Ain, she pushes the female lead towards him in hopes they can trigger their happy ending. Will she be able to save the second male lead's love?

name: Beppo's Hole in One Golf
description: A 2D top-down golf game featuring 9 holes of golf.

name: Ultimate Golf!
description: Ultimate Golf! is a multiplayer golf game where you can challenge other players and rivals in real-time tournaments, golf games, real-time duels, golf courses, and our special Golf Royale battle mode!

name: Be dog do borks
description: wow, am dog, goodest boy, owner away, do bork.

name: 1 Bit, 2 Bit, 3 Bit, Four.
description: This game was made for the WOWIE game jam! in this game, you jump towards the top of the mountain! kinda over scoped with this game, thats why there isnt much content.

name: Refreshing Sideways Puzzle Ghost Hammer
description: "Refreshing Sideways Puzzle Ghost Hammer" is puzzle game, you join Blocks with Hammer in. Let's challenge the mission with finding out the movements of Blocks falling sideways and down!

name: Together: A Wish No One Remembers
description:
This is a visual novel with 9 possible endings.
Torn between his recent broken heart and his desire to never subject anyone to that kind of suffering, Vince decides, despite his own feelings, to learn more about this mysterious girl who just confessed her love to him - still hoping in the back of his mind that his unrequited love will one day be reciprocated.

name: 快乐小鸡
description: This is a mini game for kids aged 2-3 who loves Pig Peppa.

name: Medal of Legends
description: You vs Zombies vs Gangs.Your duty is to lead the battle, save the world and become the best shooter and sniper.

name: Secret City: Chalk of Fate - Collector's Edition
description: An otherworldly adventure in the heart of the Big Apple!

name: E.B.
description: E.B. is a simple and easy strategy tower defense game where players can match their own skills and trick to defeat enemy tanks.

name: Skater Frog
description: He was a skater frog, she said see ya later dog.

name: Coin Commander
description: The enemy is invading and resources are limited. They look to you, their newly elected war commander, to use your limited funds to pay for mercenaries to protect against the oncoming hordes of enemies. You will be outnumbered, but with better tactics, you will prevail.

name: New Planets
description: Save your teacher and yourself on a journey based on a new solar system!

name: Triumph Action
description: Triumph Action is an open world, massive multiplayer competitive shooting game developed by Junyue Interactive Studio. Each game contains a maximum of 20v20 players, and a player-defined room is also available.

name: The Dark Side
description: What if the world is completely different from what you are used to seeing it? What if there are a lot of secrets in it which are protected by Guardians at all times?

name: Gjana's World
description: Hard action-platformer that tests patience.

name: Path of Zen
description: Path of Zen, a game that will help you let go of your worries about the past or the future and bring you back to where you are supposed to be, here and now.

name: Racing Bike Fight
description:
Experience the thrilling adventure in this Bike Attack Racing Game. Attack the rivals while you are racing! Race on different tracks and compete with other racers. 
 
Race on Bike as an Outlaw Bike Trickster n Master on your Simulator Off-road Racing Bike performing flippy Race stunts across unusually challenging Highway Traffic Obstacles and other 3D Off-road Motocross Stunt hurdles.

name: Kili's treasure
description: Kili's dog Rosco had to be sent to the farm recently. To cheer Kili up her mother has organized a treasure hunt with a surprise at the end! Help Kili solve the clues one after another and get to the treasure!

name: Wire Lips
description: Play as Leta in this third-person horror game. Puzzle solve in this creepy atmosphere and trying to find collectibles all to help Leta uncover the horrifying mysteries of the ancient artifact...

name: That Lava Escape Game
description: 'That Lava Escape Game' is a local multiplayer 2D platformer focused on escaping rooms filling with lava! Rooms full of traps and other challenges will try to stop you and friends from escaping with the time you have!

name: Find Me: Horror Game
description: You just invoked an evil entity that is inside your doll and wants to play with you to try to kill you, so to survive you must hide and to win, you need to find the three most beloved objects of the doll...

name: Guiding Light
description: Guiding Light is a co-op game in which you and a friend need to rescue stranded aliens from all kinds of sticky situations. One player is an alien who goes down to the planet to execute the rescue operation, while the other pilots the UFO to help guide the alien on the ground.

name: Flaky Bakery
description: A retired hero who is too lazy to bake more than 3 loaves a day. Think you can earn money and not sell out?

name: Retrace
description:
A ghost tour gone wrong leads Freya to a parallel dimension, almost designed for her. Can you beat death, and escape? A game of mystery, adventure and queer love stories.

Explore an atmospheric realm of mystery that blends pixel art gameplay with hand-painted character portraits. Solve logic-based puzzles and overcome pulse-pounding action sequences, uncover secrets about the sinister parallel dimension and explore deep relationships with Freya’s companions.

name: Deeeer Simulator
description: Put simply, Deeeer Simulator is a “Slow-Life Town Destruction Game”. You can spend your days enjoying a nice, relaxed frolic here and there together with the other animals around town, or you can choose to relieve some stress and absolutely destroy the town and everything in it.

name: Color Defense
description: Color Defense is an idle/clicker game with a tower defense theme. You can choose between different towers and upgrades to survive as long as you can.....

name: DragonScales 3: Eternal Prophecy of Darkness
description: A tile-matching/strategy game in which players form color combinations on a board to reach specific goals.

name: HyperBrawl Tournament
description:
HyperBrawl Tournament is an arena based sports combat game, fusing intense sporting action and brutally competitive PvP combat.
Select your warrior and your weapon before unleashing brawling fury in an arena where goals equal glory.

name: Wuxia World
Astral Fable
description: Astral Fable, a 3D cute anime MMORPG that is themed around a self-created story of the war between the Heaven and Devildom. In the game,players can defeat monsters and unlock spectacular skills throughout the journey. The best part, you'll never be alone here! There will be pets fighting alongside you together with the support of your couple. You could also join a guild to save this world with your comrades! This is gonna be the one you don’t wanna miss!

name: War Ender Evolution
description: The War Enders Evolution is an arcade style single-stage bullet hell game. Beat the game with the choice from three different fighters and two different styles.

name: Florr.io
description: Battle enemies and seek the rarest petals to add to your collection.

name: Shall we date?: Rewind
description: Rewind is a fantasy and mystery story under Shall We Date's Story Jar app.

name: The Last Sacrifice: A King's Past
description:
The Last Sacrifice: A King's Past is a spin-off story from The Last Sacrifice series.
It has two different endings, a romantic and a normal ending.

name: All Hams on Deck!
description: Bounce that ham! 50+ pigs to acquire! Aim for the highest score you can!

name: Solar Smash
description: Solar Smash is a mobile game made by Paradyme Games that can be installed on both the Google Play Store and the Apple App Store. It is one of several simulation games with the objective of destroying.

name: Touhou History Eater
description: Efolklore facts! Navigate a maze while enemies relentlessly chase you down, and answer trivia questions under time pressure for a temporary power-up! It might've been made in less than 72 hours, but there's plenty of oldschool arcade action and snappy chiptune remixes to enjoy!

name: Beyond Crimson Stars
description: discover Worlds and characters, laugh cry and find the meaning of life

name: CaveBugBoy
description: CaveBugBoy embarks on an epic adventure through dark and mysterious underground caves in search of a better life. The journey will encounter evil floating and screaming skulls, flying dead ants and flies, falling lava rocks, and collect bugs body parts.

name: Fight,to the last
description: This is a 2D dungeon rogue shooting game. Players can kill enemies to stick a variety of dropped weapons, free combination, through a variety of different combinations to define their own attack mode.

name: MP1: Crazy Space
description: Sin descripción

name: Green Hale
description: Small green temple map using a custom texture set. It also features a custom skybox and the map source is included.

name: Candelabra Estoscerro
description:
Candelabra Estoscerro is a 3D style, action-adventure, dungeon crawler in which the heroes from the games "The Mad Wizard", "The Scarlet Matron", and "The Warlord Slayer" band together in a quest compelled by the king. Exploration within a maze environment while battling enemies and enemy bosses are the fundamentals of the game. Your journey will be complete upon reaching the plateau's top and finding the Candelabra.  
 
Candelabra Estoscerro is uniquely played with two NES controllers, one in each hand, or with a modified Virtual Boy controller (Similar to SoleGooseProductions' Spook-O-Tron). Diagrams of the controller format are pictured, but further depth can be found in the in-game manual, or available to view on the Sly Dog Studios website. Modified Virtual Boy controllers are not available on this campaign, but a tutorial will provided demonstrating how to make the alteration.

name: Spinny's Journey
description: Help Spinny to find his way through mazes, dodge traps and fix his spaceship to get back home. Spinny's Journey is a challenging 2D action-puzzle game. You'll fly with his emergency propeller and search for the pieces to repair his spaceship. The game will challenge your skills and resilience with its simple-to-learn and hard-to-master gameplay.

name: Monster Girls and the Mysterious Adventure
description: Let's go on adventures with monstergirls!! This game is Roguelike RPG.

name: Frontier - TRS
description: Frontier – Tactical Response Squad is a fast-paced top down shooter based in a dystopian future where mage corporations are in control. The corporations driven the environment to the edge with excessive resource extraction and humanity is forced to live in a high-tech bio domes.

name: Circle
description: Circle is an indie nurturing adventure game. Nurture "Circle" and explore the "Outside" of the room. You must procure foods for the "Circle" and love the "Circle" for yourself.

name: Deeper Red 2028: We Are Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Coffee Break
description: Cafe management and crafting sim where you live the hectic life of a Barista. Play alone or with friends for the price of a latte!

name: UIFO Defense HD
description: UIFO Defense has a special gameplay of tower defense. Utilize the terrain and different turrets to eliminate alien invaders and protect the crystal cores which are critical to science and technology of your civilization.

name: Sparkle 4 Tales
description: Play as a Sparkle of Life and grow into a beautiful aquatic being. Immerse yourself in the atmospheric surroundings from the beginnings of life, and the beautiful soundtrack to complement your experience. Explore the vast deeps in a quest to join the most developed organisms.

name: King K Roller 2
description:
Everyone's favorite regal reptile returns in a brand new adventure.

King K Rool is nothing but a meme character; at least that's what his peers think of him. This inferiority complex drives his attempt to alter the course of history to be seen than more than just a "meme character". Luckily, after finding a time stone, the crocodile is able to embark on this adventure of altering the past.

This adventure includes 9 rage-inducing levels, jam packed with difficult jumps, engaging boss battles, and captivating cutscenes.

This game is for god gamers only. It is very difficult, and is intentionally rage inducing, but it is much more fair than the previous installment of King K Roller (which I recommend you do not play).

name: Picross Love
description: Picross, also known as hanjie or nonogram, is a puzzle loved around the world that consists of filling the right boxes that together form a hidden drawing. Additionally in "Picross Love", you will be accompanied by lovely women. It may not improve your concentration, but it will surely make your time more enjoyable. Do you think it's difficult? No worries! Our teacher, Pico-chan, will teach you, step by step, how to become a Picross champion!

name: Warriors Orochi 4 Ultimate: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Edge Case
description: EDGE CASE is a puzzle game about navigating, linking and altering the game world. It includes 22 levels of gradually increasing difficulty.

name: Tetrominos AR
description: Tetrominos now get real with AR! Tetrominos AR is a funny and clever game for anyone that wants to get the real Puzzle experience in AR. Stack the tetromino blocks in the real world and share your score with your friends! The gameplay is simple, try to stack blocks into complete lines.

name: Adventure Pinball Bundle
description: Enjoy 3 games in one with the perfect reproduction of real pinball machines, with all kinds of graphic details and sounds. Discover all the secrets, in these thrilling games, dragons, pirates and mythologic creatures are waiting for you. Complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard.

name: Retro Bowl
description: Retro Bowl is an American football simulation game in the style of pixelated video games of old. Play as one of 32 teams, making personnel decisions and playing in the games to try and win the Retro Bowl at the end of the season.

name: Wood and Water and Rock
description: An audio-only exploration of a post-human city-forest activated by perpetual rain, where you're sometimes alone. This is a short prototype with an endless environment.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Ultimate Edition
description: The Ultimate Edition includes the game, a Cooking Item that gives your character permanent Ki-ATK, Ki-DEF and HP Stat boosts, Season Pass (2 original episodes and a new story), a music compilation pack (11 additional songs from the anime) and the Tao Pai Pai Pillar.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes the game, a Cooking Item that gives your character permanent Ki-ATK and HP Stat boosts, and the Season Pass. The Season Pass adds 2 original episodes and a new story.

name: Bionicle Heroes: DOOM
description: This is a weapon and playerclass mod for GZdoom. This mod adds 8 new weapons. Weapon sprites were made by rendering 3d models taken from the original game.

name: Idle Army Base
description:
Create the greatest military base the world has ever seen! You enter the army training camp as a private on your first day and there is no time to be idle as you are put through your paces and a series of training challenges in order to graduate, ready for army action around the world!

Earn money as you progress through the army training in your base and then manage the expansion of your camp, where you upgrade the value, speed, capacity and queue sizes of all the training areas. It’s going to be a rollercoaster ride, but with no room for lazy or idle cadets, you will love growing and upgrading your army base.

name: Kogasa's Lunar Fright Mission
description: Kogasa is going to do the biggest spook of all time!

name: Kemco RPG Omnibus
description: 4 in 1 Game Collection - Revenant Dogma, Illusion of L'Phalcia, Chronus Arc, and the Legend of the Tetrarchs.

name: LastShot
description: Last Shot - A fast platformer shooter where you can jump, smash, blow up enemies with your own bombs.

name: Chuusotsu! 1.5th Graduation: The Moving Castle
description: Join Arue and her merry Chuusotsu band on her first visit to a certain doujin event in the Big Site, and share in her struggles as an aspiring manga creator!

name: A Percent of a Pirate
description: A captivating pirate adventure to learn math while having fun. Available in some schools, this game will teach you different ways to manipulate percentages and ratios.

name: Westminster Darkly
description: A turn-based strategy RPG set in modern time Westminster (UK), after a massive solar storm causes the end of the electric age.

name: Escape from the death castle
description:
You don't know why you are locked in this castle, but you know you should escape here. 
 
Enemies are everywhere, and they will never let you through. Their only purpose is to prevent you from leaving. All you can do is find for food and weapons in each room, improve your attribute ability, defeat them one by one, and leave here.

name: Prison Forever
description: You play as yourself in an alternate reality. In this reality you are in prison forever. It's over, you got caught, just accept it. You can do literally nothing but be in your prison cell for the rest of time. You get a bed, toilet, and a window that shows you the real time of day! There is no way to escape so don't try. Enjoy!

name: Revenant March
description: In a fortress besieged by ghouls, a young exorcist must use power, diplomacy, and inhuman languages to unravel a grudge spanning generations.

name: Calamari Clash
description:
Calamari Clash is a competitive multiplayer versus game in which you duke it out with your friends for victory… and survival.

You play as a Calamartian, a species from an alien world, who along with its companions crash on an unknown planet. The only way to escape from this place is to dash it out against your friends to charge the spaceship's battery by holding it as long as possible. Only one can escape this mysterious planet, it better be you.

name: Taurus VR
description:
Jump into a thrilling, adrenaline-fuelled VR Space-shooter with Taurus VR, a reimagined retro game for VR.
Move like never before with our extremely responsive 6 degrees' body motion control system. Fight your way through an alien universe using your body movement to control the spaceship, and your hands and arms to handle the dynamic attack and defense combat system. Out manoeuvre and destroy aliens, mercenaries and rebel spaceships, then compare your score with the global Scoring and Challenge system

name: Britannic
description: Welcome aboard the HMHS Britannic, the sister ship to the RMS Titanic. Experience first-hand how the biggest ship in the world met its demise in 1916. Do you have what it takes to survive?

name: Gizmos: Steampunk Nonograms
description: Solve challenging nonograms (also known as picross, griddlers, etc.) to decipher a message from a distant planet!

name: Legend of Streets
description: Show them who is the ruler of the streets by cleaning up gangs, pirates, mafia and cops and other enemies on the streets!

name: Bryce's Movement Engine 1
description: Be prepared for a trip into yesteryear! Bryce's Movement Engine¹ is an MSDOS Ware meets Post-Trainwreck-era game set in the halcyon days of 1998! An all-new classic adventure, BME¹ is the ultimate tribute to a mega-cool era of awesome gaming!

name: Blackthorn Arena
description: Blackthorn Arena is a strategy/management sim with real-time combat system set in a fantasy world with mythical monsters and classic fantasy races. Play as the master of Blackthorn Arena, train your slaves into gladiators, forge them into your champions and send them to fight for your glories in the arenas!

name: Forgotten Passages
description: 100 Tiny Levels. Stumble down a surreal rabbit hole and explore an atmospheric world composed of one hundred visually rich dreamscapes. This micro adventure takes about one hour to play straight through. Follow a girl and a mysterious bird through the wormholes of an eclectic universe.

name: SoulfulLand
description: Save the mysterious land of monsters, finding the solution of the disorder 2D exploring action game, that can play with two player too. Defeat powerful enemies, and explore everywhere.

name: Star Fetchers
description: Star Fetchers: Pilot is part 1 of a journey following two inner city thugs as they take on the hardest gangster there ever was. Star Fetchers is an adventure huffing on the fumes of 90's midnight TV, delivering a story paved with bizarre scenarios, ugly characters and high paced action. Follow the gang "The Thornz" as they crawl out of the slum and make it to the top.

name: Ghost Dimension
description: Experience a challenging spaceship game without shooting. Collect, teleport, become a ghost and beat another level inside the same world. Can you do this job?

name: Lost in Transit
description: Lost in Transit is a unique blend of the classic Asteroids and modern bullet-hell games. As a space-traveling mailman, fight your way through dozens of levels to deliver the final package in your route.

name: Split or Steal
description: Have you ever wanted to devote your time and energy to amassing a small fortune, and then place total trust in a complete stranger to not steal it all away from you?

name: Kings of the Castle
description:
The dragon Zantorian locked Prince Rupert away in a castle tower on a dangerous and mysterious island. Lord Baldor dispatches the Princess to investigate the hostile and unfamiliar territory.

Playing as the princess, you must use your courage, strength, and savvy sense of direction to save the Prince. Find keys and potions to help you get to the top of castle tower. Collect gems along the way to pay a ransom for the prince’s safe return, but do it fast! The dragon is hungry!

Kings of the Castle is a speed-run, a scavenger hunt, and a fairytale all wrapped up in a cozy, colorful blanket.

name: Tokyo Mirage Sessions #FE Encore
description: You and the rising stars you call friends will need to call on your own creative power - manifested as iconic Fire Emblem characters - to wage a secret war on rogue spirits that feed on creativity. Each encounter will immerse you in deep, turn-based battles that blend the combat of the Fire Emblem and Shin Megami Tensei series into one brutal harmony. Fuse items to craft weaponry; then play to your strengths and crush your foes. Around every corner you'll find fun nods to multiple fandoms, including Fire Emblem references, dungeons themed to the entertainment industry, and stunning musical performances.

name: Star Girl Proxima
description: Become a magical girl hero and defend the alien world of Proxima Centauri b in Star Girl Proxima! An 8-bit style action-platformer.

name: Dark Hope
description: Dark Hope is a puzzle adventure game set in a steampunk world where electricity started and ended its existence with the light bulb. Towering clockwork puzzles and archaic symbols cover the halls. Strange rifts of light span the hallways.

name: Rodent Warriors
description: Rodent Warriors is an epic 2D action rpg / idle / indie / retro game... about rodents!

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot
description: Relive the story of Goku in Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot! Beyond the epic battles, experience life in the Dragon Ball Z world as you fight, fish, eat, and train with Goku. Explore the new areas and adventures as you advance through the story and form powerful bonds with other heroes from the Dragon Ball Z universe.

name: Areia: Pathway to Dawn
description: Areia is a game about emotions and spiritual growth. It is a tale of wonder in a land inhabited by only one character. Sand and water are the two elements shaping this uniquely crafted world. And, with the relationship between character and environment, you can traverse this world by creating your own path. Use water as energy and sand as a foundation for every action you take.The story symbolizes a search to enlightenment and what you make of it is yours to take. Areia is an adventure that invites you to dive into a world of contemplation, feel, and understanding.

name: Lenna's Inception
description:
Explore a dangerous island filled with dungeons, and defeat the eight archangels to bring order to a glitched-out kingdom in this top-down Zelda-like action-adventure game. Playable in 8-bit and 32-bit pixel art styles! 
 
Features 
- Team up with a friend. Make peace with Shadow Lenna to enjoy the game in local co-op multiplayer! 
- Play again (and again). With two graphical styles, multiple endings, multiple boss forms, and procedural generation, you won’t see everything in a single playthrough! 
- Challenge yourself. Speed through the daily challenge dungeon with no sword, with only three hearts, or without taking a single hit. Show off a GIF of your playthrough on the connected leaderboard afterwards! 
- Recruit companions. Will you choose Henrietta, the free-range chicken with a vendetta, or perhaps Gourdon, the sentient pumpkin? (4 to discover)

name: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Rustland Grand Prix
description: Themed on a post-apocalyptic desert world.

name: Bed Lying Simulator
description: Simulator of lying on a bed. Or lying to a bed. Or maybe the bed is lying. Is your bed lying to you?

name: So 2 Mice Walk Into a Bar...
description:
In the adolescent year of 2018, one "stick mice in my head and then beat my head in with a hammer and let them back out" was birthed into the world via a purulent sludge. Quick, hasty, raw, it ended up being a moderate success.

"So 2 Mice Walk Into a Bar..." is not a sequel to that. There is no JUMP Team here. In fact, we hate JUMP Team now. This is instead a spiritual successor which focuses on the most fun aspect of "stick mice..." (quickly designed levels focused around an ASM gimmick of sorts) without the limitations of "stick mice..." (begone sole C3 resources!).

Much of this hack was designed during the month of December 2019, hastily and under the influence. We hope you enjoy it as much as we enjoyed making it.

name: Food Truck Tycoon + Expansion Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Vocaloid Pack 2
description: A new pack featuring 10 songs, navigators, and avatars from Vocaloid! Includes a VTuber cover song!

name: Catch the Dragon
description:
"Catch the Dragon" is the first game from LDLC VR Studio. It uses the technology of free roaming, offering a much more immersive experience than traditional virtual reality. Each player has a virtual reality headset and a PC in a backpack. They can interact and move freely throughout the game.

The game is played with 2 teams of 2 to 3 players. The team of Norse gods from the Order faces off against the team of demonic forces from Chaos.
Each player chooses their playing style between the mage and their magic staff, or the archer and their evil bow. Both teams have a common goal: to get the dragon's strength as many times as possible without being neutralized by the enemy's force.

name: Cookie Run: Puzzle World
description: Cookie Run: Puzzle World, titled Cookie Run: Jelly Pop during the soft launch, CookiePuzzle during early development, and Hello! Brave Cookies during the first season of the game, is a free-to-play Match 3 game released by Devsisters

name: Fail Factory!
description:
Immerse yourself in a whimsical robot factory while climbing your way up the corporate ladder from lowly intern to esteemed star employee. In a wacky spectacle of increasing chaos, strive to keep up with the escalating comedy of errors as you operate various assembly lines in a myriad of mini-games. Entrenched in a physics-based, no consequences playground, experience three main types of mini-game stations, all with the goal to help the factory build robots on a massive scale.

Working in assembly stations, sorting stations and quality assurance protocol (QAP), where you’ll control unfathomably large robots, you’ll hone your skills in a factory that feels reactive and alive, allowing for a fully immersive experience. Designed with approachability in mind, ridiculous failure is inevitable as you work your way to the top in this vibrant, witty and comedic stress-inducing Fail Factory!.

name: Total War: Three Kingdoms - Tao Qian
description: Tao Qian has long been a steward of the Han and his own territory. He is renowned as a dependable and respectable governor, and one who focuses on building tall. He wants to make life better for the people he governs, and defends his lands against those would dare to encroach upon it.

name: The Surge 2: Premium Edition
description:
Welcome to Jericho City.

Explore the devastated metropolis and fight its numerous, ferocious threats in unforgiving combat. Slash and tear equipment from foes utilizing The Surge 2's dynamic Limb Targeting System.

The Surge 2 - Premium Edition contains the full game, and all the Season Pass content. This includes the story-focused expansion The Kraken, and all the new weapons and armor sets DLCs.

name: Touhou: Shooting Star
description: As a wizard "Marisa Kirisame", Fly in the Gensokyo! This is fun game of "Touhou Project"! See beautiful danmaku of touhou characters. Develop your weapon, armor, spell card to get strong. Let's play "Danmaku"!

name: Dying is Dangerous
description: "Dying is Dangerous" is a memory game set in a horrific and dangerous world. Observe and remember the traps or... die !

name: Bricks Defender
description: Bricks Defender is a brick breaker game where you will face off against the computer opponent through 15 exciting levels. Do your best to defend your own blocks while at the same time aiming to destroy the blocks of the computer opponent.

name: Bricks Pinball
description: Bricks Pinball is a brick breaker game which combines the game mechanics of a traditional brick breaker and a flipper game. Play through 15 exciting levels as you aim for a high score.

name: So Many Me: Extended Edition
description: Filo is Filo, one of a kind or so he thought as he is woken from his peaceful sleep and eat life to go on a quest of great importance. Which he doesn’t really care much for the details so he just does. His journey however starts in a magical fountain which splits Filo’s essence into hundreds of clones each shaped by an individual part of his personality which are called Me’s. However they are all a part of him so they are compelled to move when he does. Me’s as well as Filo now also have the ability to turn into magical stone platforms which can be used for puzzle solving. Eating transmitter fruits changes the properties of the transformations. Filo can also work with the other Me’s to do special dances to allow them to transform into creatures like the Jellysaur or the Tankephaunt. He runs into other characters like Flora who seems to be a fan girl. Filo is supposed to be going after The organization called Cloud 9 in the world of Xio, runny Baron Vost. The rest he is just goofing off.

name: Pokémon Steam
description: A French fan-made Pokémon game in which you embody the son/daughter of the Champion and try to be one in your turn in an all-new region named Exodius.

name: Multiverse
description:
Multiverse. Come in and experience our first domain - The Planetarium. Explore astronomy like never before - socially in VR with your friends.

Multiverse is an experience like no other. Learn about astronomy while navigating through awe-inspiring environments that showcase the solar system, its planets, their moons and other solar bodies.

Enter the Planetarium to discover mind-blowing images, videos and models, all rendered in stunning detail, with audio descriptions, toys and interactive exhibits.

Chat, fire off rockets, chase each other through the solar system, or play hide and seek behind Jupiter. Multiverse's focus on streaming and social interactions make this a social experience not to be missed.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Season Pass
description: Deepen your Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot experience by grabbing the Season Pass which includes 2 original episodes and one new story.

name: Treasure Tech
description:
Treasure Tech is a Doom Gameplay Mod inspired by the Wario Land franchise, featuring a slew of other elements from arcade games and retro classics.

Play as Chesterfield, more known as Treasure Guy, as he shakes down the forces of hell for their pocket change! Tackle your foes, and throw them into each other!
Collect tons of coins, jewels, strange artifacts, and spend your earnings to power yourself up! Use an array of exotic weapons as you hunt down every last penny on the map!

name: Kandagawa Jet Girls: DX Jet Pack
description:
From the creators of Senran Kagura, the future's wettest and wildest new sport is here! Join one of seven teams and race through Tokyo's waterways on futuristic jet machines, using water weapons to blow your opponents back onto dry land!

This edition contains:
- Game: Kandagawa Jet Girls
- Hanaharu Naruko-designed special box
- Game original anime Blu-ray disc “Tokyo Girls Promotion Starts Here” (approximately 21 minutes)
- Two-disc soundtrack CD including the theme song (54 tracks, approximately 119 minutes)
- Special art book (over 60 pages)
- Limited edition box art
- Additional character downloadable content: “Yumi and Asuka Enter the Race from Senran Kagura“

name: Super Mario 64 Splitscreen Multiplayer
description: This mod of Super Mario 64 allows the game to be played in multiplayer mode with splitscreen, while the original game was single player only. This mod is playable on real Nintendo 64 hardware.

name: Miden Tower
description: Miden Tower is a fantasy RPG with a compelling and dramatic story. After Miden Tower is invaded by the Alroval Empire, the mages who call it home find themselves cornered on its upper floors. This sets in motion a series of tragic events that lead to a counteroffensive being launched to take back the tower and to get revenge for the wrongs committed against them.

name: Little Big Rabbits
description: Go rescue the princess before its too late. You have 6 worlds to explore with different environments, many mechanics to master and tons of dinos to smash! The game can be played both in First and Third Person (Adjust using ScrollWheel or Controller DPad Left + Right).

name: SpaceVibes
description: An Artistic VR “Shooter” Game For Everyone! Enter space and enjoy shooting flying objects with a laser gun while jamming out to the SpaceVibes soundtrack! A game without gore, that doesn’t encourage shooting living things… In fact, you can’t!

name: Sierra Ops
description: Woefully ill-prepared, play as Junius as he struggles to uncover long-lost secrets new and old while fighting an impossible war.

name: 坦率的小红帽和爱说谎的狼
description: 温馨而有趣的短篇剧情游戏，讲述了可爱小红帽与笨笨狼少年的森林冒险故事，总计4种结局，不含黑暗成分哦（笑）

name: Touhou Fantasy Day
description: 这是一款东方+传统RPG游戏。 幻想乡的太阳突然不会落下，永日威胁着整个幻想乡的安全, 于此同时，各地的小妖精们也蠢蠢欲动，一切都在预示着幻想乡又要发生一次巨大的异变......

name: Femida
description: Judge Simulator 2020. Play the role of Judge Daemon Mardoch and investigate the disappearance of your father during the Last Revolution. Set in the dystopian State with a post-WWII level of tech and noir aesthetics.

name: Guardians of the Ashes
description: As a rookie female soldier being lost memory. Your are tasked with investigating a group of criminals in the deserted city of Orland and unknowingly discovering a secret ruins underground. And here, you being attacked and chased by demons, things drag on after things ... the true origin of the world gradually reveal... and then, as "The Chosen One" - you have to protect the world.

name: Gala Collider
description: Four billion years in the future, Earth is a distant memory devoured by the same sun that once gave it life. The Milky Way and Andromeda galaxies are in the middle of a cosmic collision triggering a battle for dominance and survival between alien species.

name: Juken Jigoku
description: Juken Jigoku is a Japanese themed horror game inspired by the fears, anxiety and doubts that students have to go through during their school life and the exams time.

name: Spellsword Cards: DungeonTop
description: A rogue-like deck-building experience coupled with table top battles. Choose a hero and allegiance then dive deep into the dungeon, evolving your deck for survival. Each choice you make matters, even in between battles!

name: TaskForce Gamma-13 : An SCP Tale
description: This game is a third person shooter where you, a member of the Gamma-13 task force should recover a lost android, but found much more than expected.

name: Total War: Three Kingdoms - Mandate of Heaven
description:
The Total War: Three Kingdoms – Mandate of Heaven Chapter Pack depicts the events of the Yellow Turban Rebellion, enabling players to engage in the conflict from either rebel or loyalist perspectives.
